name: Breakout Revolution
description:
Bored of brick breakers too repetitive and tiresome ? Breakout Revolution will constantly surprise you with its originality and its frenzy levels and gameplay! Featuring an adjustable difficulty mode , you can progress at your own pace while keeping aim to finish as quickly as possible (to get more points ) .

Discover the different game mode (hole , fan, bumper , ...) which will embark you on levels of madness and bonuses that will help you overcome ! Manage yourself the power of your bonus and their probability of occurrence !
Breakout Revolution will make you relive the era of the great classics of the genre everything by adding its share of modernity. Start now in this incredible adventure and enjoy every day a bonus level!

Features:

-135 Levels ( Free )
- Upgradeable bonus ball on fire multiplier balls , Canon, ...
- Adjustable Difficulty ( ball speed )
- A fashioneditor : a first! Create your own levels (the only limit is your imagination !)
